import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Layout, Menu, Dropdown, Icon, Button, Avatar, Drawer, Input } from "antd"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import AppRouter from "../../router"; import { NotificationTab } from "../components/Header"; import "./PageLayout.scss"; import { isAbsolute } from "path"; const { Header, Sider, Content } = Layout; const { SubMenu } = Menu; const forMobileStyle={ marginLeft:0, position:'absolute' } const forTabStyle={ marginLeft:80, } const forDesktopStyle={ marginLeft:220, } const messageMenu = ( Message ); class PageLayout extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { collapsed: false, windowWidth:window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].clientWidth, windowHeight: window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].clientHeigh, User_Name:'', User_Email:'', sendMsg:'Ravi' } this.updateDimensions = this.updateDimensions.bind(this); } state = { visible: false }; showDrawer = () => { this.setState({ visible: true, }); }; onClose = () => { this.setState({ visible: false, }); }; sendMassage = (e) => { this.setState({ sendMsg: 'test', }); }; updateDimensions() { var w = window, d = document, documentElement = d.documentElement, body = d.getElementsByTagName('body')[0], width = w.innerWidth || documentElement.clientWidth || body.clientWidth, height = w.innerHeight || documentElement.clientHeight || body.clientHeight; console.log("Width : "+width); this.setState({ windowWidth: width, windowHeight: height }); width <= 991 ? this.setState({ collapsed: true }) : this.setState({ collapsed: false }) } componentDidMount() { window.addEventListener("resize", this.updateDimensions); } componentWillUnmount() { window.removeEventListener("resize", this.updateDimensions); } componentWillMount() { var profile_data = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("session_data")); this.setState({User_Name:profile_data['first_name'] + " " + profile_data['last_name']}); this.setState({User_Email:profile_data['email']}); } toggle = () => { this.setState({ collapsed: !this.state.collapsed }); }; render() { const userMenu = (
{this.state.User_Name}
{this.state.User_Email}
My Account Company Settings ); return (
Dashboard {/* Bank } > Personal Corporate Analytical */} Analytical News Weather Calendar Wallet Source Documents Test Test-RR Settings } > My Account Company Settings
  • } placement="bottomRight" trigger={["click"]} className="dropdown-notification" >
  • {/*
    Hi, Received Msg
    Hello, Send Msg
    {this.state.sendMsg}
    */}

    Recent
); } } export default PageLayout;
